Text:
Sorry guys but my hard drive crashed.  I am in the process of recovering and will seed as soon as I can.  I have now had two Western Digital External Hard Drives die on me.  I am done with WD.
Thanks for your patience.  Sorry.
Well I got the hard drive to work long enough to complete a upload before it quit on me again but there are currently 2 seeders so it is up to you guys from here.  KEEP SEEDING PLEASE
